duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform broadband installations and service changes following applicable codes, guidelines, and company procedures to ensure a positive customer experience.
Troubleshoot and problem solve customer inquiries and concerns to ensure products and services are functioning properly and enhance customer satisfaction.
Update customer accounts and provide education on products and services to drive a positive customer experience.
Use installation and hand tools, perform tasks from high places, manipulate connectors and wires, and work in confined spaces or near power lines while adhering to safety practices.
Maintain proper equipment and drive company vehicle in a safe and responsible manner in various weather conditions.
Complete required training, certifications, and ensure punctual attendance for continued employment.
